title: Mystery island
brief_description: This adventure story involves a smuggling racket, a mysterious character and a ship wreck on a desert island - all set in the beautiful Northern Queensland reef islands! Two children visit their cousins who live on one of the islands and left to their own devices, the children get caught up in an intriguing series of events.
